description: Charlotte is stressed out about bills - they're broke and their electricity is about to get turned off. So she's not in the best mood when her delivery guy boyfriend Jay comes home with yet another pizza (40% employee discount!) Their argument about money is interrupted by a phone call from Charlotte's ex Draven. They broke up because she didn't want to move to Silicon Valley, but now he owns a successful tech start-up and is back in town. He shows up complete with flowers and champagne, and pretty soon Charlotte and Draven are rekindling their relationship as Jay watches, humiliated. First, Charlotte shows how much she's missed Draven with a blow job, while Draven makes fun of poor Jay. Then, Charlotte suggests this is a perfect time for Jay to live out his fantasy of sucking another guy's dick. Jay very reluctantly agrees and goes to work on Draven's big, thick rod. Once Draven is good and warmed up, he gets to fucking Charlotte, who's loving every minute, much to Jay's dismay. He feels like a total loser while his girlfriend is in ecstasy. And Draven is just getting warmed up! (Part 1 of 2)
title: Fuck the Pizza Guy (Part 1 of 2)
